A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was better than I expected and I’ve been there since the beginning. This is as good or better than Empire and considering that was my favorite it says a lot. Don’t let the bad reviews intimidate you\, they are from supposed Star Wars fans who are upset because they spent a bundle on EU and none of it comes out in the movies. It’s good\, it’s a complete story and leaves no questions. May The Force Be With You!!
